snippet: A free-speech lawsuit is challenging North Carolina’s complaint that a blogger is giving illegal counseling.
abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column on free-speech lawsuit filed by blogger Steve Cooksey, who is challenging North Carolina's complaint that he was giving illegal nutritional counseling on his Web site; case highlights the collision between power of government to license and regulate those pursuing a profession and the freedom of speech guaranteed by the First Amendment.
lead_paragraph: A free-speech lawsuit is challenging North Carolina’s complaint that a blogger is giving illegal counseling.

headline.print_headline: Blogger Who Gives Advice Resists a State’s: Get a License
headline.seo: Nutrition Blogger Fights North Carolina Licensing Rebuke
headline.main: Blogger Giving Advice Resists State’s: Get a License
